10.eng-name: The Book of Leading the Prayer (Al-Imamah)

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Aisha may Allah be pleased with her, that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) told Abu Bakr to lead the people in prayer. She said:"The Prophet was in front of Abu Bakr and he prayed sitting down, and Abu Bakr was leading the people in prayer, and the people were behind Abu Bakr

chapter.eng-name: Following those who are following the Imam
